scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_PATH=./ node dist/src/server
scripts.public: mkdir -p public && cp -r src/client/css public/ && cp src/client/index.html public/
scripts.build-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify src/client/js/index.js -o public/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: npm run compile-server && npm run public && npm run build-js
